title: Baby Stone Gorillas on Viral Courthouse Fight Video, Stinc Team Beef & More
description:
Baby Stone Gorillas have been in the headlines a lot recently, they break everything down with T-Rell!

-----
00:00 Intro
2:23 - BSG give their side of the story of what happened at courthouse
4:40 - Not respecting clout chasers or recording the opps
9:07 - No beef with the Stinc Team. Not engaging in rap beef
10:50 - Advising the Stincs to “be more confident in what they do”
16:30 - Flakko was talking crazy during their last interview with DoKnow
17:58 - DoKnow lied about being in the camp with BSG and seeing them squabble
27:09 - No plans to do any solo projects right now
28:12 - BSG still wants to take Adam to the set. Might have to DP him for not inviting them to his birthday party
34:23 - Coincidentally running into each other at the car dealership after getting paid
41:09 - Accidentally walking in on Key Glock’s session at Empire
42:05 - Recording a song together after walking in on Kalan Frfr and Onetake’s session
42:40 - Legendary nights in the studio with Big Sad and Sauce Walka

-----
